Title: A Helping Farmhand
Description:
Greetings, $p, name's Orren. We've got a whole mess of Jawcrawlers that came up from underground attacking the crops. Something a $c like yourself could really help out with!

Hunger is never far away in Hallowfall, so saving these crops is my priority.

But if you'd be willing to drive them off for me, I'll be able to focus on my long-term plan to feed people more effectively.

Meet me over by the shed! And bring any food that's not too chewed up.
ObjectivesText: Recover 8 Slightly Chewed Harvest Bounty from Gluttonous Jawcrawlers.
